title: JORDAN - RWA MASTER
advisor_msg: Mayor, the RWA market is booming. Here are our best blockchain-certified opportunities.

help.title: What is RWA & Tokenization?
help.rwa_def: RWA stands for Real World Assets. It refers to physical assets (real estate, gold, etc.) that are brought onto the blockchain.
help.token_def: Tokenization is the process of converting ownership rights of a physical asset into digital tokens.
pros: Fractional Ownership: Buy a small piece of a big asset.
Transparency: Everything is recorded on the blockchain.
cons: Regulation: Rules vary by country and can change.
Smart Contracts: Potential bugs in the code.
Liquidity: Some assets might be hard to sell quickly.
